targets.query:
from(bucket: "Laboratorio")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Módulo de turbinas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ED001" or r["_field"] == "EG001" or r["_field"] == "EI001" or r["_field"] == "FIT001" or r["_field"] == "FP001" or r["_field"] == "IAC001" or r["_field"] == "IC001" or r["_field"] == "IC002" or r["_field"] == "IG001" or r["_field"] == "IG002" or r["_field"] == "LEH001" or r["_field"] == "LEL001" or r["_field"] == "PB001" or r["_field"] == "PB002" or r["_field"] == "PG001" or r["_field"] == "PKVA001" or r["_field"] == "PG002" or r["_field"] == "PKVAR001" or r["_field"] == "PKW001" or r["_field"] == "PT001" or r["_field"] == "PT002" or r["_field"] == "TE001" or r["_field"] == "TE002" or r["_field"] == "TE003" or r["_field"] == "TE004" or r["_field"] == "VAC001" or r["_field"] == "VB001" or r["_field"] == "VB002" or r["_field"] == "VBU001" or r["_field"] == "VCH001" or r["_field"] == "VDF001" or r["_field"] == "VDN001" or r["_field"] == "VFL001" or r["_field"] == "VG001" or r["_field"] == "VG002")
